languages.text: "Я простоял{mf||а} в проклятой очереди почти три оборота, без сна и удобств. Или ты заверишь эту бумагу, или, клянусь Императором, я убью тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "Я простоял{mf||а} в проклятой очереди почти три оборота, без сна и удобств. Или ты заверишь эту бумагу, или, клянусь Императором, я убью тебя!"

languages.text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"
languages.original_text: "Я простоял{mf||а} в проклятой очереди почти три оборота, без сна и удобств. Или ты заверишь эту бумагу, или, клянусь Императором, я убью тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"
"I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"
"I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"
"I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

languages.text: “我在这该死的队伍中站了将近三巡，没合过眼，也没享受过任何便利设施。要么你给我把文件认证好，要么我向帝皇发誓，我非弄死你不可！”
languages.original_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

traits.locale_text: “我在这该死的队伍中站了将近三巡，没合过眼，也没享受过任何便利设施。要么你给我把文件认证好，要么我向帝皇发誓，我非弄死你不可！”

languages.text: «Me he pasado casi tres turnos en esa maldita cola, sin dormir y sin entretenimiento. O certificas este documento ahora mismo o te mato, ¡lo juro por el Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

traits.locale_text: «Me he pasado casi tres turnos en esa maldita cola, sin dormir y sin entretenimiento. O certificas este documento ahora mismo o te mato, ¡lo juro por el Emperador!».

languages.text: 「このひどい列に並ぶのはもう3巡目だ、睡眠もとれなければ快適に過ごせるわけでもない。この書類を認証しろ、さもなくば皇帝に誓ってお前を殺す！」
languages.original_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

traits.locale_text: 「このひどい列に並ぶのはもう3巡目だ、睡眠もとれなければ快適に過ごせるわけでもない。この書類を認証しろ、さもなくば皇帝に誓ってお前を殺す！」

languages.text: « Ça fait près de trois tours que je fais la queue dans cette maison de fous, sans nulle part où dormir ou me restaurer. Soit vous certifiez ce document, soit je vous tue sur-le-champ, l'Empereur m'en est témoin ! »
languages.original_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça fait près de trois tours que je fais la queue dans cette maison de fous, sans nulle part où dormir ou me restaurer. Soit vous certifiez ce document, soit je vous tue sur-le-champ, l'Empereur m'en est témoin ! »

languages.text: "Ich stand fast drei Umdrehungen in dieser verdammten Schlange, ohne Schlaf oder Annehmlichkeiten. Entweder Ihr zertifiziert dieses Dokument, oder ich schwöre beim Imperator, dass ich Euch töten werde!"
languages.original_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich stand fast drei Umdrehungen in dieser verdammten Schlange, ohne Schlaf oder Annehmlichkeiten. Entweder Ihr zertifiziert dieses Dokument, oder ich schwöre beim Imperator, dass ich Euch töten werde!"

languages.text: "O kahrolası kuyrukta neredeyse üç devirdir duruyorum, ne uyku yüzü gördüm ne de ihtiyaçlarımı giderebildim. Bak, İmparator'un adını veriyorum... Ya şu belgeyi tasdik edersin ya da şuracıkta canını alırım!"
languages.original_text: "I stood in that damned queue for nearly three turns, without sleep or amenities. Either you certify this document, or, I swear to the Emperor, I will kill you!"

traits.locale_text: "O kahrolası kuyrukta neredeyse üç devirdir duruyorum, ne uyku yüzü gördüm ne de ihtiyaçlarımı giderebildim. Bak, İmparator'un adını veriyorum... Ya şu belgeyi tasdik edersin ya da şuracıkta canını alırım!"
